title: Issues post Android 10 Upgrade - HELP?!?
content:
I recently upgraded to andoid 10 on my pixel 3xl, and it was bliss until my battery died. 

Upon charging:
-The home button doesnt work- I can't swipe up to see all open apps
- The screen capture button has gone missing - When I hold the power button there's an emergency option and a power off option only.
- Instagram- if I'm looking at my DMs and recieve a notification of a new dm, I have to close the Instagram app and reopen it to read the message.


I've restarted two more times hoping it was a fluke. 
Wtf happened to my phone amd how do i fix it?
